name: MATCH (itch) (Ron0Studios, ToastedToast, Treejog)
description:
Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK Jam!

There is a windows exe version as well, if the web version is too slow!

check out a better version of the tutorial in the game itself!
Chain pieces of chess together and score points, avoid bowling balls while trying not to break the chain. 
Different pieces adds different scores.
The more points, the more time you have.
A game made by Ron0Studios, Toasted Toast and Treejog

BUG- THE GAME CRASHES WHEN THE TIMER RUNS OUT
(at least you can see your score at the end, i think)
